summary: A comprehensive pytest test suite that validates the core functionality of a video editing library, covering audio and video clip creation, manipulation, compositing, file I/O, FFmpeg integration, subtitle handling, bitmap and text rendering, utility helpers, documentation examples, and regression issues.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the multimedia processing library through automated testing, enabling continuous integration, early bug detection, and confidence in feature implementations for developers and endâ€‘users.
